Email: [emailÂ protected] | [emailÂ protected] Google Scholar GitHub Gallery (Fuji X100) I am looking for a few self-motivated graduate students (both PhD program and Master program) at University of Alberta, working in the area of software engineering, AI, cybersecurity, and related topics.
